text: Campofiorito () is a comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Palermo in the Sicily region in Italy. It is about south of Palermo. Campofiorito is next to these following municipalities: Bisacquino, Contessa Entellina, Corleone. == Twin towns == Campofiorito is twinned with: * Aci Catena, Italy * Catenanuova, Italy == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Settlements in Palermo
title: Campofiorito
